content: Hi all! Next Thursday (the 17th) we'll be starting the Topos Institute Colloquium back up. We already have some speakers scheduled over the next few months, and a brand new webpage with more information about the themes and goals of the colloquium. Take a look! https://topos.site/topos-colloquium/

as a reminder, if you want to receive the emails with the Zoom link and the title and abstracts directly, you can join the mailing list by sending an email with arbitrary* subject and message to seminars+subscribe@topos.institute

*maybe there's some weird behaviour if you write something really crazy as the message, but let's not try to stress test the system...
